_sText:
Original Author: [D*H] ~ Kon$olE Mapper: Silent Ricochet Custom Textures: Shiroko Custom Bumpmapping: Silent Ricochet Summary: A moderately medium sized map. Very well optimized, should run well on almost any semi-decent platform. I get a constant 100+FPS on a 4 year old machine. The map has seen a huge change since it's last release, mostly texture aligning, got rid of some brush clutter, soundscapes, a new 3d skybox, and bumpmaps for VALVe textures. This comes with a NAV file as well including info_nodes and other entities of that sort to help the hostages and bots navigate the map better. Have fun :)
Change Log: Version 3.0 Additions -Optimized the hell out of the map (nodraw plays a huge part) -Added numerous soundscapes (for better reverb and sound effects). -Added more Cubemaps (for more accurately shown reflections) -Added step in front of Podium -Added more money props, desk and office chair to left hostage room -Added tons of Info_nodes and info_node_climbs -Added button that plays church music -Added Powerbox and buttons in basement -Added immense 3d skybox -Added several bumpmaps to 3-4 textures to correct visual errors and add realism Changes/Fixes -Fixed Cubemaps that were being displayed from the floor below/above -Fixed Texture mis-alignments -Fixed Incorrect spawn points -Fixed color and brightness of basement lights -Fixed Mis-aligned brushes -Fixed some mis-shaped brushes effecting gameplay and lighting -Improved brush work of podium, grass, and walls. -Changed complicated objects to func_detail for a raise in performance -Changed the directions terrorists were facing when spawning -Deleted a few ambient generics that didn't play a significant role -Deleted insignificant brushes that created clutter and dropped performance -Other small changes and fixes that I forgot and really don't matter
Version 2.0 Additions -Optimized greatly, saving 40+FPS since last version -Added 3d Skybox -Added Parking Lot -Added green window lighting effects -Added Small plants and other props -Added a few decals -Added More cubemaps -Added Ambient sounds -Added ramps on most entrances (realism sakes) -Added Front doors (doors?! holy crap really?1!?) Changes/Fixes -Fixed cubemaps -Fixed Water rendering -Fixed small cracks in ceiling, walls, and ground -Improved the Pews -Made ground, windows, walls, and other miscellaneous brushes thinner (realism sakes) -Changed ropes from brushes to move ropes with invis ladder textures -Changed texture of outside wall -Changed lighting in basement, nixed a few lights to make it darker -Changed front gate from crappy brush to props -Changed health of all breakable brushes (realism) -Re-built and edited nav file greatly improving efficiency of Bot gameplay -Re-arranged static props for better gameplay and hiding spots. -Some small other fixes and changes
